parks.name: Acadia National Park
parks.description: Experience the rugged coast of Maine with granite peaks, woodlands, and lakes.
parks.weatherInfo: Summers are generally mild with temperatures ranging from 45°F to 85°F. Winters are cold with temperatures from 14°F to 35°F.

operatingHours.description: Park is open year-round, 24 hours a day

parks.name: Yellowstone National Park
parks.description: The world's first national park featuring geysers, hot springs, and abundant wildlife.
parks.weatherInfo: Weather can change rapidly. Summer temperatures range from 30°F to 80°F. Winter temperatures can drop to -20°F.

operatingHours.description: Park is open year-round, but some roads and facilities close in winter

alerts.title: Road Closure
alerts.description: Scenic Drive is closed due to rock slide. Expected reopening in 7 days.

visitor_centers.name: Acadia Visitor Center
visitor_centers.description: Information center providing park maps, permits, and educational exhibits about Acadia National Park.
visitor_centers.directions: Located near the main entrance. Follow signs from the main road.

campgrounds.name: Acadia Campground
campgrounds.description: Scenic campground offering tent camping with beautiful views of Acadia National Park.
campgrounds.directions: From the main entrance, follow signs to campground area.
campgrounds.reservationInfo: Reservations required. Book online at recreation.gov
